conclusion: Analyze scenario where toy car collides with groups of blocks to determine collisions and stopping point.
Identify groups of blocks of different colors arranged in a pattern.
Car A is moving towards the right side of the image.
Car will likely collide with blocks on its path as it moves right.
Determine final position of car after colliding with blocks.
Car will collide with blocks in order encountered from left to right.
Car will stop at the point where it has traveled the furthest, at the rightmost group of blocks.
Final answer: Car will stop at the rightmost group of blocks.
